Text: is anyone else having problems with this?  it works fine up to the point where Hartigan is being tortured....the video just freezes and the audio runs for me...or if i try to advance to anything after that, i get no sound or video, it just freezes....anyone have a solution?
Yeah, watch it in cinema or buy the DVD when it comes out... that's the easiest way to avoid any trouble ;)
Play it with VLC Player if that don's work try some other codecs
It works now with VLC Player, thanks kronjorten23
Yeah, awesome job Oskari...works fine..awesome vid and audio quality....always in sync for me
this is an excellent release, thanks! i didn't notice any out-of-sync parts, video and audio quality is great. thanks for the work!
ja tack den subben vore fin, palalr inte synka om själv :P

Sry for not creating this right away when the french Dvdrip came out, didnt realise that back then.

Now on, if theres an english TS and a foreign Dvdrip  (or TC) version of a movie, ill combine them, just pm me or something if you find one. (The movie has to be good, wont bother with crappy movies)
Stormbringer ! Ja tack kan du lägga upp den subben ? Hade vatt jättefint ha det gött !
Synkad svensk undertext finns nu på http://thepiratebay.org/details.php?id=3350572
Tackar för denna! Bra kvalité. Tog undertexter till TS-versionen och satte delay på -3 få fungerade det ypperligt i VLC.
Does this work on bsplayer? I would like to know if somebody has tried it.
NÅn som kan seeda undertexten "sincityfinal.srt" som passar till den här utgåvan av Sin City

tänkte bara nämna ett bra program när det gäller textning. om texten du har till filmen inte hänger med ordenligt, ladda bara ner ''time adjuster'' och läs den här guiden: http://falo.no-ip.org/ladda/guider/synka_text_i_film.pdf så kan du rätta till den =)
